summary:
This MOD is added Custom Voice Follower.
Voice is Japanese. Subtitles are in English.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fOmIeuk.png[/img]
[color=#ff0000][center][size=6]---- Notice ---- 
[/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4][i]This MOD is a Japanese voice. Subtitles are in English, but I am using the translation site. Therefore, it is not a correct grammar. The help of the translation are welcome!![/i][/size][/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4][i]
[center][youtube]EdeyzYobTbo[/youtube][/center][/i][/size][/font]
[/color][b][font=Verdana][size=5][i][color=#a4c2f4]Requirements[/color]
[/i][/size][/font][/b][font=Verdana][size=4]- Skyrim version 1.9.29.0.8+
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=4]- VRAM 1GB+[/size]

[i][b][color=#a4c2f4][size=5]Installation and Uninstallation[/size][/color][/b][/i]
[size=4]- Recommend that you use the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/]Mod organizer[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/]NMM[/url].

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qw46194.png[/img]

[/size][/font][font=Verdana][color=#a4c2f4][size=5][i][b]About Amalia
[/b][/i][/size][/color][/font][size=4][font=Verdana]- You can find her in [color=#ffe599]New Gnisis Cornerclub (Windhelm)[/color].
[/font]- Body Type is the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/]UNP[/url].
[/size][size=4][font=Verdana]- [/font][font=Verdana]Follower Dialogue occurs after a conversation with her.[/font]
[/size][font=Verdana][size=4]- Files are all independent. There is no need MOD.
[/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=4]- [/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=4]Level is synchronized to the player. The initial value of the level is 10.
[/size][/font][size=4]- Currently, can not marry her. Perks does not get current.
[/size]
[font=Verdana][size=3][i]- Specialty: Light armor, One-Hand and Two-Hand, Bow[/i][/size][/font]

[b][size=3]Special Thanks![/size][/b]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#d5a6bd][size=4][i][b]Voice actor: Alto Marumi[/b][/i][/size][/color][/font]


[b][i][color=#a4c2f4][size=5]Compatibility
[/size][/color][/i][/b][size=4]- This MOD is equipped with a follower function on its own. Is compatible with the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/]UFO[/url] for that.
- There is no problem probably also [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/]EFF[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/]AFT[/url].
- Is compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/]My Home Is Your Home - a mod for followers[/url].
[/size]
[font=Verdana][color=#a4c2f4][size=5][i][b]Recommended MODs
[/b][/i][/size][/color][size=4]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/]Face Light[/url] by tktk
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/]Ashara Princes of the Woods for UNP and male[/url] by SydneyB[/size][/font]

[i][b][color=#a4c2f4][size=5]Photography used ENB
[/size][/color][/b][/i][font=Georgia][size=4][i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50501/]The Grim and Somber ENBS[/url] by WolfGrimDark
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23812/]Seasons of Skyrim ENB True HDR[/url] by Bronze316[/i][/size][/font]

[font=Verdana][color=#a4c2f4][size=5][b][i]
Credits[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/][img]http://i.imgur.com/2rUNWFA.png[/img][/url][color=#a4c2f4]
[/color][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]by [/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos[/size][/font]
NewSea, Alesso, Anto, Darko, Sintiklia, Skysims, Peggy, Raonjena, Wings-Sims, XM-Sims and Zauma.

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4][i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by ECE team
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by Hello Santa
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] by HHaleyy
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by Gabriel Mailhot
[/i][/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4][i]- [/i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/]Pretty Face[/url][i] by tktk[/i]
[i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
[/i][i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/url] by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity
[/i][i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url] by Caliente

[/size][/font][font=Verdana][color=#a4c2f4][size=5][i][b]Special Thanks[/b][/i][/size][/color]

by Harrmannesque and Mi7Sama.[/i][/font]
[/b][/size][font=Verdana][size=4]
